trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB2_00573_COLANA_000_001<tab>Thanks to you and your canny craft, I can come back to work at the best forge I've ever known. There are no words to explain the joy...
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB2_00573_COLANA_100_001<tab>I never thought you'd drag Rend back to the Bellows. With the three of us together again, it'll be just like old times.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB2_00573_COLANA_000_050<tab>No time for talking! There's work to be done and coin to be made!
